biotools.summary:
Gene prioritization based on random walks with restarts and absorbing states, to define gene sets regulating drug pharmacodynamics from single-cell analyses.

Reranked gene lists. Our final product is the set of top genes defined by (Def. def-genetrank), possibly accumulated over several values of the restart rate (Def. eq-topkler).

bioschemas.name: GENetRank
